# Repository Description

## üéµ Media Downloader & Converter

**Professional-grade media downloader and converter** with advanced audio quality options, smart format detection, and comprehensive documentation.

### What It Does
- Downloads videos and audio from DRM-free sources (YouTube, Soundcloud, Bandcamp, etc.)
- Converts between multiple formats (MP3, MP4, WAV, AAC, OGG, FLAC, MKV, AVI, WebM, etc.)
- Provides 7 MP3 quality presets including professional V0 VBR
- Supports 8 different sample rates for precise audio control
- Smart format filtering based on input file
- Beautiful Qt-based user interface

### Key Features
- ‚ú® **V0 Variable Bit Rate** - Transparent audio quality with 25% smaller files
- üéöÔ∏è **7 Quality Presets** - From 96kbps to 320kbps + VBR options
- üìä **8 Sample Rates** - 8kHz to 48kHz, or auto-detect
- üéØ **Smart Format Detection** - Shows only compatible output formats
- üöÄ **Fast Processing** - FFmpeg-based conversion engine
- üìÅ **Multiple File Processing** - Batch convert multiple files
- üé® **Professional UI** - Clean, intuitive interface

### Tech Stack
- **Python** 3.8+
- **PyQt5** - Cross-platform UI
- **yt-dlp** - Media downloading
- **FFmpeg** - Audio/video conversion

### Limitations
‚ö†Ô∏è **DRM-Protected Content**: Cannot download from Spotify, Apple Music, Netflix, or other DRM-protected sources. Works only with DRM-free content.
